steps.text:
Case records of the Massachusetts General Hospital. Case 29-2012. A 49-year-old 
man with pain and cranial-nerve palsies after treatment of oral cancer.
Wirth LJ(1), Plotkin SR, Emerick KS, Cunnane ME, Faquin WC.

Author information:
(1)Department of Medical Oncology, Massachusetts General Hospital, Boston, USA.
